verbs.description: < p > As [ARG0: Robert Mueller] [V: looks] [ARGM-MNR: ever more closely] [ARG1: at President Donald Trump 's foreign business ties] , one former associate has remained outside the spotlight despite playing a key role in Trump 's quest for real estate deals in former Soviet lands.</p >

< p > As Robert Mueller looks ever more closely at President Donald Trump 's foreign business ties , one former associate [V: has] remained outside the spotlight despite playing a key role in Trump 's quest for real estate deals in former Soviet lands.</p >
